Articles.Content:
(I didn't know where to put this but it'll be alot like the Naval Battle Thread)

"As Kerbals began to develop rockets many feared of Warfare with these new Scientific Instruments, As the Kerbals rocket technology advanced so too did Weaponry thanks to Companies such as Zokesia and Arcadia. The Kerbal International Government in desperation created the "Kerbal Interplanetary Defence Administration" to squash these Companies. As KIDA grew it seperated from the Kerbal Government and joined the Arms Race. All of the Kerbals first steps were a Scientific Endeavor, Now their next steps are in Military Domination."

Me and Spartwo have been working on this since I joined the Forums, This is a Kerbal Military/ Diplomacy Roleplay. To set up an Empire Message me or post it here, There are 3 more empires aloud at the moment, If this gets more popular I may increase that number. To create an Empire you must Own A Company, An empire is consisted of one or more Companies, Companies are permitted to join empires if the founder gives them permission.

Empires

Arcadian Empire

Zokesian Empire

Tyrene Empire

How to claim a Planet/ Moon

To claim a Planet or Moon first you must launch a Colony ship from Kerbin, Then land it on the designated Celestial body, Remember your Flag must fly and 8 kerbals must make it to the surface alive for that planet to be considered your empires.

Basic Rules

I. Persistant Debris MUST BE TURNED ON, Debris can't be deleted until after a battle.

II. Conquest Battles are done by Ship class not Tonnage, Prohibits 1.5t Fighter spamming.

III. The Kerbin System is to Remain Neutral, Used for Weapon Testing not conquest.

IV. During Ground battles you are aloud Three Turns but the Ground Vehicles have to be within 1km of each other for this to be in effect.

V. During Total War All fleets and colonies in those companies jurisdiction are involved and can be destroyed.

VI. All Craft Must be STOCK

Edited August 12, 2013 by The Fleet Master
In this case I'm suppling to Zokesia.We need a republic of some kind.And who are the Arcadians?

Arcadia is my Company, Arcadia Armory.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/45723-Arcadia-Armory-%28Grand-Opening%29

Arakyd Industries wishes to enter the fray. We are a commercial mining and research company currently operating on and around the Mun. Primarily we focus on fuel and development of new spacecraft. We can neither confirm nor deny inquiries into weapons development.

Here's a sampling of what Arakyd has been up to-

Low orbit mining outpost, unmanned but capable of supporting life. Designation "Dromund Kaas".

A lovely view from the interior of a research facility in high orbit, designation "Seraph".

Permanent residential station in LKO. Further construction cancelled due to 3 FPS, unfortunately. Designation "Leviathan".

Arakyd Industries currently stands neutral, and is willing to contract fuel shipments or scientific information to other corporations or governments.
Taco do you have any Stock Craft? Rule VI. All Craft Must Be stock, Zekes and Comerade Jenkens Play stock only.

The Imperial Zokesian Empire claims Duna and Ike.

Our page:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/45627-Imperial-Zokesian-Empire

Edited August 12, 2013 by zekes
Most of my craft are stock, yeah. In my case, mods are used for station addons, KSSPP, Kethane, FusTek, etc. Everything else is stock. If needed I can redesign stations for a shared persist file.

While the CEOs of Rusty Hangar Aircraft Emporium do not publicly support any of these companies, we can supply any number of them with atmospheric military vessels capable of flight on Laythe and Kerbin. While we do not know how it'll get there, we decline any involvement.

Crafts are in my signature.

EDIT: Also my Triumvirate Launchers. All stock and can be used for populating a colonial ship.
During Total War Scenarios All Stations, Bases, Ships will be merged into one persistance file, So everything must be stock.

II. Conquest Battles are done by Ship class not Tonnage, Prohibits 1.5t Fighter spamming.

I'm guessing that's directed at me.
Lol, Yes it is, I'll come up with a Chart for Tonnage of ship classes.

Hmmm. I don't actually own a company, i'm just part of KIDA.

I've just ended up as the OP of the Tyrene Empire by circumstance.
I am the Foreign Ambassador of the Zokesian Empire. I handle diplomatic relations and such. If you have something to say about diplomacy with us, talk to either me or Emperor Zekes.

Im am chairman of [sSI] Sierra Space Industries. We provide primarily logistical support but we do come prepared to defend our own operations as necessary. [sSI] currently does not endorse one specific empire but our services can be aqquired by the highest bidder. We currently operate off an outpost on the Mun and run kethane import operations from Minmus. We are preparing to launch and outpost mission to Duna and are in the early planning stages of an expansion to Lathe and the Jool system.

I may be contacted by PM if any empire wishes to contract SSI.

I'll just leave these here.
So, [sSI], you're basically mercenaries?
Still not leaving Ike.
Zekes has to lad a colony on Ike and Dune for them to be considered Zokesias, Zekes better hurry.
Wait, Spartwo, I thought you said you want to ally with Zokesia.

I can have a 17 kerbal outpost there in a matter of hours. I share nicely so long as Zokesias remains peaceful toward [sSI]. Note, this particular oupost does use mods. I use it as a preliminary. I will have a stock oupost there within a day or two to make persistence sharing easy.

So, [sSI], you're basically mercenaries?

Sort of. We aren't primarily a combat agency. We specialize in more peaceful and logistical operations. That being said, many of our vehicles are armored and we do have our own escort fighter to facilitate operational defense as necessary. We are, however, available for contract services, though we do not share any politically based alliances.

NOTE: Most of you got here in 2013, so a warning to you all: The reason Radion mounted a roleplay sticky on the Forums was to replace the original roleplay, which was BANNED last year.

Do not be suprised to get mods breathing down your necks. I don't know exactly what the rules are now, but the original Roleplay was removed about May last year by the moderators. KSP used to have a section of the Forums dedicated to roleplay, but it grew uncontrolled, without quality check or enough mod support, so much so that trolls and spammers invaded it, forcing the Mods to obliviate the Roleplay forums in favor of the Fan-Works, which exclude Roleplay.

I'm not saying that i hate Rp'ing: My first post was in the Welcome section annoucing i'd be joining the Roleplay, and i headed the Field Dynamics Corporation in it until it was taken down. This is only a warning informing you as to what happened in the past. Go join Radion's Roleplay, they have an entire website dedicated to it now. And to the Mods, sorry if i got a little overzealous with this - only trying to tell them what they don't know.

If this is within the rules however, more power to you. I might even get back into it.

Edited August 12, 2013 by Dynamo

Wait, Spartwo, I thought you said you want to ally with Zokesia.

I am aren't I.

20 kerbs and counting

Train 1 fuel depots and reconnasance landers

Train 2 duna base,L.R.V,Return lifter.

Train 3 Ike base,sat network

A "gift" for the Tyrene Empire

Train 4 military ships

Train 5 base tug,munitions,uav

there are several around duna.

Edited August 13, 2013 by Spartwo

Well, I have to rerun my mission since I just fell victim to momentary lapse of concentration and the bug that super-high time warp does not deactivate when passing through the atmoshere.

Do tell me, what coordinates did you set down at? In the interest of potential future contracts, I would like to be within a rover's drive but not so close that if things go bad, well, you get the picture.

Edited August 12, 2013 by Captain Sierra

Again, I'll just leave this here.

EDIT: Due to an unexpected bounce and then a flip, I sustained some minor damage on landing. I was able to recover it but I lost a light, solar panel, and the docking port. Due to a major miscalculation in the landing, over half the fuel in the base was burnt, rendering a re-orbit mission impossible. With the loss of the docking port, this is irrelivant. [sSI] will mount a rescue and recovery mission for all on board as our more permanent operations progress.

Edited August 12, 2013 by Captain Sierra

I am the Foreign Ambassador of the Zokesian Empire. I handle diplomatic relations and such. If you have something to say about diplomacy with us, talk to either me or Emperor Zekes.

As of today you are also Vice CEO. congratulations.

Saprtwo yes we are allies, would you like to share a co-op persist of Duna and Ike so we can have two bases (would make the planets much harder to take)?

Plus I have zero experience with small missiles, you would take care of lighter fighters, I do heavier weapons.

EDIT and orbital weapons platforms. I am awesome at those.

Edited August 13, 2013 by zekes
